title: Cheesy spinach quiche
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '150g grated Gruyere cheese', '280g frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry', '1 (23cm) unbaked pastry case', '2 large eggs, lightly beaten', '350ml milk', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '1 pinch ground nutmeg']
